Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Flap extension asymmetry. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Foreign object damage to critical surface
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Door Mechanism component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Conduct fleet-wide inspection campaign
d) Attributable Code: N2 - Defect Not Confirmed
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
Date: 03/01/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde S.B. Rao
